document_data.mainbody: heldivur was a veteran battle-mage. At some point prior to the , he was killed somewhere in Chessenta during a war between wizards in sight of a young Maldiglas Turntower. Glittering rings remained on his hand. The young man snatched what he could from Kheldivurs charred corpse before it cooled down, kickstarting his own career as a wizard.
